column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
Maril looks as though he is expecting someone.

With the chat mode in <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Say<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, enter “tuktu” to assure the hardened hunter you are not an enemy.
With the chat mode in <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Say<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, enter “tuktu” to assure the hapless hunter you are not an enemy.
Report to Maril.
A moment, if you would. I am recently returned from patrol, but I fear something has happened to my comrades. By all rights they should have arrived here when I did, if not sooner.
It was meant to be a simple sweep of the perimeter, dispensing with any raptors we spotted along the way.
Would you be willing to search for them? In case they should return before you do, I will remain here to receive them.

Hmmm. If they are wounded or hiding, they are not like to reveal themselves to a stranger. You will need our password─tuktu. But say the word and they will immediately know you for an ally of Slitherbough.
If you find them, do not forget to speak the password─tuktu.
Stay back!

With the chat mode in <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Say<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter “tuktu” and allay the hunter's fears.
tuktu
Ah, thank goodness. When I heard you approaching, I feared the worst.
I spotted a raptor not far from here and thought it a suitable opportunity to train my companion, a hunter newly joined to the guard. Yet in my fervor for the hunt, I somehow lost track of him.
The raptor is injured, but to leave it now would jeopardize our stores of food, or worse should anyone else cross its path. I must go after it.
Would you search for him in my stead? Once you have found him, return to Slitherbough and inform Maril that I've spotted a raptor and gave chase.
Mercy! Mercy!

With the chat mode in <UIForeground>F201F4</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201F5</UIGlow>Say<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>, use your keyboard or the software keyboard to enter “tuktu” and allay the hunter's fears.
tuktu
Tuktu? Oh, thank goodness.

We were hunting raptors, and managed to corner a rather nasty one. Or so we thought. After taking an arrow to the backside, it let out the most bloodcurdling scream. I was expecting it, but I panicked and ran all the same.
I think my nerves are settled now, though. I expect I'll get an earful from Maril, but I suppose I have it coming.
There you are. My comrades returned not long ago.
Though I was disappointed to hear our newest guardsman fled in the face of danger.
What will you say?
Perhaps he's not fit to protect Slitherbough.
Perhaps he needs more training before venturing out into the woods.
Perhaps you are right, but I must give this some thought before I speak with him. Thank you again for your help, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>.
